Landing.CallToAction: Explore Destiny utilizando o Braytech e obtenha boas vantagens e detalhes sobre suas lutas contra as forÃ§as das Trevas

Features.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Destiny 2 character progression, clans, triumphs, collections, and more. Braytech is a Destiny fan site that allows users to view and map checklists, track and view triumphs, inspect collectibles, and so much more.

Braytech started as a checklist app and has bellowed into a monstrosity of many talents. It's always being refined and expanded.

Need to find something quick? Press î»– and start typing! Braytech has a search interface, available anywhere in the app.

Braytech is built for desktop users first, but functions as well and looks as beautiful on smaller devices. In fact, there's an [iPhone app](https://apps.apple.com/app/braytech/id1593151816) and an [Android app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=braytech.org.twa). Want to make a suggestion? Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech)!
Features.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Braytech

Support.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Braytech is a full-time jobâ€”I design and develop to improve myself and to aid all Guardians. I'm anti-ads, to my own demise. Your support helps me keep the lights on and allows me to do my best work and to make your Destiny experience even better. I hope you love using it as much as I love building it! ğŸ’–

Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) and the other patrons in the Braytech Research Division.
Support.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Are you a fan? Show your support

Landing.PollsChannel: ğŸ¦˜ Join the conversation on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) and vote on how Braytech can improve.

Profile.Description: ğŸ¦˜ What gives you power; through light and dark, do you hold the frontlines as a Titan, disintegrate entire armies from afar as a Warlock, or move cowardly through the shadows as a Hunter?

Medals.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Recognition

Digital tokens of recognition, medals celebrate various forms of contribution and achievement. Displayed proudly on your profile, they highlight your involvement, support, and accomplishments within the Destiny community.
Medals.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Medals

Activity.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ A Ghost's Guardian

Your life after your life begins here. You are a risen, chosen by a Ghost, and bestowed with great power through Light and Darkness.

These were your first steps.
Activity.Name: ğŸ¦˜ First Risen

Dresstiny.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Fancy pants

Some say you're a leader in fashion, others say you're a trendsetter, but one thing is for sure: you know how to equip items!

This is the true endgame: Dresstiny.
Dresstiny.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Dresstiny

Highlight.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Your pride and joy

You've elected to wear this accomplishment on your shoulder, for all around to see.
Highlight.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Highlight

Ranks.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Through boldness to the stars

Lead fireteams to victory against minions of the Darkness and compete against one another in the Crucible for accolades from Lord Shaxx himself.
Ranks.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Guardian Standing

Commonality.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Triumph and claim your rewards

Earth and worlds beyond touched by the Traveler hold wonderful oddities and sought-after treasures of myth.

The fun is in the chase.
Commonality.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Rare Treasures & Exotic Style

Titles.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Emblems of victory

The ultimate measure of a completionist and collector; wear them well.
Titles.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Triumph Titles

Gambit.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Infamous

Well, well, well... look who's been stackin' motes and droppin' Blockers like it's target practice. You Guardians are a real stormâ€”Invadin', bankin', clearin' waves like it's child's play.

{{number}} wins, huh? That's somethin' special. You're not just playin' Gambitâ€”you are Gambit. Reckon the Darkness is takin' notes.
Gambit.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Gambit

Crucible.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ [Incoherent screaming]

YES! This... this is what the Crucible was MADE for! Your Light blazes like a sun, burning through doubt and weakness! I am HONORED to witness such power! Now get back in thereâ€”show them what LEGENDS are made of!
Crucible.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Crucible

AggregateActivityStats.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Cumulative Experience

Sure, you've annihilated "gods," and in some cases, formed weapons from their remains, but just how many times have you thoughtlessly murdered them...
AggregateActivityStats.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Aggregate Activity Stats

Share.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Brag about it

Share a link to your Legend and a unique preview image will be generated for you to share with your friends.

This image is generated from your current profile data and updates regularly; however, some services may cache it for a period of time.
Share.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Share

Subscriptions.Info:
ğŸ¦˜ Ads suck so Braytech doesn't use them, but none of this is free or easy!

In place of ads, I depend on your generosity. Your support helps keep the app online, enables me to work on new features, and pays my rent!

Subscribe at one of the following tiers for cool rewards such as profile medals!
Subscriptions.Help: ğŸ¦˜ You can get help with this at any time by jumping on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) or by emailing [subscriptions@bray.tech](mailto:subscriptions@bray.tech).
Subscriptions.HelpMore:
ğŸ¦˜ Subscription tier pricing is displayed in USD. Changing tiers is achieved by resubscribing at a different tier.

You can get help with this at any time by jumping on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) or by emailing [subscriptions@bray.tech](mailto:subscriptions@bray.tech).
Subscriptions.AuthRequired: ğŸ¦˜ Authenticate with Bungie.net to create or manage a subscription.

State.Ending: ğŸ¦˜ You subscribed on **{{created}}** and your subscription will **end** on **{{currentPeriodEnd}}**.
State.Renewing: ğŸ¦˜ You subscribed on **{{created}}** and your subscription will **renew** on **{{currentPeriodEnd}}**.
State.Cancelled: ğŸ¦˜ Your subscrition **ended** on **{{currentPeriodEnd}}**. Thank you for your support!

DiscordProfile.Disconnected: ğŸ¦˜ Connect your Discord profile by using the `/register_discord_with_voluspa` command in the Discord [server](https://discord.bray.tech).

Newsletter.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Receive Email
Newsletter.Description: ğŸ¦˜ Get Braytech's blog posts and any relevant subscriber information delivered directly to your inbox.

ChangeTier.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Change Tier
ChangeTier.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Changing tiers is fast and easy. All you need to do is confirm. You will be billed immediately.

As always, if you have any issues or want to chat, please don't hesistateâ€“hit me up at [subscriptions@bray.tech](mailto:subscriptions@bray.tech) or @ me on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech).

Subscriptions.BlogInfo: ğŸ¦˜ Keep track of Braytech's development by following along with the latest blog posts. I try to keep these as interesting and insightful as I can!
Subscriptions.DiscordInfo: ğŸ¦˜ Join the Braytech community! Hang out, drop suggestions, report bugs, and get help for the app instantly.
Subscriptions.NewSubsInfo: ğŸ¦˜ Recent subscribers who carry Braytech on their shoulders, enabling its continuous development.
Subscriptions.OneTime: ğŸ¦˜ Make a one-time donation to support Braytech. No strings attached, but I will take you out for a drink.

Username.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Shorten your address from a bunch of long numbers to something superior.

Choose a unique name or match your Bungie name, it's up to you. This is just another cute way to distinguish yourself from other players and it makes it easier to go straight to your profile on a device you haven't used.

Emoji supported **ğŸ¸**
Username.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Username

Highlight.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Choose to highlight a special triumph or an impressive stat tracker.

This highlight is displayed on your [Legend](/legend) view and in images generated for links you share around the internet.
Highlight.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Highlight

EmblemCodes.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Braytech has amassed a grand collection of emblem codes, sometimes contributed to by its most benevolent users.

As a subscriber, you may redeem an emblem code from [The Developer's Stash]({{url}}).
EmblemCodes.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Emblem Codes

AdvancedLeaderboards.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ If you're a [Leaderboards](/leaderboards) power user, you've got two more tools in your inventory.

As a subscriber, you can compare the difference between two adjacent players on a leaderboard, and you have option to update your profile's Leaderboards data and reassess all leaderboards on demand.
AdvancedLeaderboards.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Advanced Leaderboards

Medal.Description: ğŸ¦˜ High tier subscribers unlock a permanent medal for their profiles, displayed wherever their profile appears, both on roster entries and in player details dialogs.
Medal.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Medals

PriorityDevelopment.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Braytech is only as great as its usefulness to its users. I, the developer, have always taken feedback and suggestions from users.

Users have made Braytech greater, and I'll prioritse your feedback and suggesstions.
PriorityDevelopment.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Priority Development

Newsletter.Description: ğŸ¦˜ Subscribe to Braytech's newsletter to receive blog posts and more directly to your email inbox. It's an old Cryptarch technology, but it's functional.
Newsletter.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Newsletter

BraytechLegend.Updated: ğŸ¦˜ Your legend has been updated. âœ¨
BraytechLegend.Disabled: ğŸ¦˜ Your legend has been disabled.
BraytechLegend.Info:
ğŸ¦˜ Brandish your profile with a unique username to make sharing easier, select a triumph or tracker to highlight when your profile is shared, and choose a character to default to when a link to your profile is shared without a character specified.

[Subscribers](/settings/subscriptions) get many perks including the ability to grab a custom username.
BraytechLegend.AuthRequired: ğŸ¦˜ To alter your legend, you need to first authenticate Braytech with Bungie.net.
BraytechLegend.SubscriptionRequired: ğŸ¦˜ To claim a username and other cool tricks, you need to be a subscriber. [Support Braytech](/settings/subscriptions) through a subscription.
BraytechLegend.Username:
ğŸ¦˜ Select a unique username or fallback to your Bungie name. You can change this at any time.

A branding specialist is available upon request for a modest fee.
BraytechLegend.UsernameSpecifications: ğŸ¦˜ Maximum length for usernames is 127 characters. Any word character (equivalent to [a-zA-Z0-9_]) and some emoji are supported.
BraytechLegend.DefaultCharacter:
ğŸ¦˜ You can choose a character to be a default for links shared without a character identifier.

For example, if you share a link to https://bray.tech/@/{{username}}, Braytech will ask the viewer to select a character. You can select a preferred character instead.
BraytechLegend.ShareHighlight: ğŸ¦˜ When your profile is shared, an image specific to you is generated. You can choose to highlight a triumph or tracker you're proud of. This will also be displayed on the [Legend](/legend) view.

Subscriptions.Info:
ğŸ¦˜ Ads suck so Braytech doesn't use them, but building Braytech costs time.

In place of ads, Braytech depends on your generosity. Your support helps keep the app online, enables work on new features, and keeps the developer alive and housed!
Subscriptions.RewardSeraph: ğŸ¦˜ Unlock the **Seraph** medal, a symbol of dedication and commitment to protecting the Warmind and its assets, and bettering humankind.
Subscriptions.RewardSubmind: ğŸ¦˜ Submind tier patrons unlock this animated Warmind ultra medal.
Subscriptions.Rewards: ğŸ¦˜ Unlock unique profile medals when you subscribe to Braytech's Patreon.
Subscriptions.Leaderboards: ğŸ¦˜ Leaderboards are a lot of work, which while thought-provoking, is particularly costly. I had to buy Databases for Dummies and everything. If you like collecting things, maybe I could [interest you in unlocking some a rare medal](https://www.patreon.com/braytech) for your Braytech profile?
